review: The Google Chromecast is very easy to set up and use. It pairs easily with your device and the simple push to stream on the TV is great. The only thing i would recommend is having fast internet service. I have the minimum speed from my provider and loading and drops occur but with the proper speed it brings YouTube, Netflix, videos, photos, etc. easily to your TV for better viewing. Highly recommended.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This dongle is better than I expected! It was super easy to setup... took me about 5 min to hook up to my tv, iPad, etc. I'm so happy that I now have a way to watch some of my favorite live streaming websites on my tv. One thing that really helped me was to go to youtube and watch some tutorial videos on Chromecast. This is how I learned how to set everything up quickly and know all the cool features it can do. Like before I didn't know that I could watch videos that i have saved on my laptop, but now I know how to do it thanks to youtube. I think some of the negative reviews about Chromecast has to do with people not even knowing fully how it works. If you take the time to check out some videos online, you will realize how fantastic this little thing is
author: CeCe
